mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cartItem (ci_number, cartItem_id, product_id, cart_id) VALUES (#{ci_number}, #{cartItem_id}, #{product_id}, #{cart_id})
mapper.select: SELECT a.cartItem_id, a.cart_id, a.product_id, a.ci_number, b.p_name, b.p_price FROM cartItem a LEFT OUTER JOIN product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cart_id = ( SELECT cart_id FROM cart WHERE id = #{id} )
